name: Laser Launch
description:
Created in 48 hours for Kenney Jam 2021. Theme: Rotation 

Result: 2nd Place!

(If you're getting audio glitches, try switching to low quality mode, muting the audio or playing the PC build).

Rotate the radar dishes to retarget lasers and escape Mars! 

Hover the mouse over a radar and 

- hold or press left click to turn it anti-clockwise 

- hold or press right click to turn it clockwise.

If you get stuck, you can press 's' to skip the current level.
